column4: I install MYbooks professional but it didnt install a icon and I cant launch it can anyone help
find the command line command to launch it.. its also possible it added an icon but the menus dident get refreshed
thats odd.  Check the grub2 forums/pages then. The thing even finds windows for me thats on exteranl usb hard drives
how did ya install the app? if  You used the package manager. use the package manager tools to see what it installed where
